query: UPDATE credits SET status = 'paid' WHERE balance = 0.00 OR balance = '0.00' OR CAST(balance AS DECIMAL(10,2)) = 0;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 39APTXvo4uMgQep.root --database DeEuadowf9qAwz5LwVE6pc --execute UPDATE credits SET status = 'paid' WHERE balance = 0.00 OR balance = '0.00' OR CAST(balance AS DECIMAL(10,2)) = 0;
